attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In honour and tribute to all those who live or work in Wootton Bassett, it would be great to award the town the status of a Royal Town.  
They have done so much in recent months for all our troops that they deserve some recognition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
